cheml.wrappers.engine module¶

class cheml.wrappers.engine.BASE(CompGraph)¶

Bases: object

class cheml.wrappers.engine.Parser(script)¶

Bases: object

script: list of strings
A list of lines in the cheml script file.
fit()¶

The main funtion for parsing cheml script. It starts with finding blocks and then runs other functions.

Returns:

cmls: cheml script

transform(cmls)¶
goals:
  • collect all sends and receives
  • check send and receive format.
  • make the computational graph
  • find the order of implementation of functions based on sends and receives
Parameters:cmls –
Return implementation order:
 
class cheml.wrappers.engine.Settings(output_directory='CMLWrapper.out', InputScript_copy=True)¶

Bases: object

makes the output directory.

output_directory: String, (default = “CheML.out”)
The directory path/name to store all the results and outputs
input_copy: Boolean, (default = True)
If True, keeps a copy of input script in the output_directory

output_directory

fit(InputScript)¶

cheml.wrappers.sct_utils.std_datetime_str(mode='datetime')¶

(std_time_str): This function gives out the formatted time as a standard string, i.e., YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.
